title: Creating an Equation
text: The complementary angles add to $$90$$ and have a difference of $$55$$ degrees. So, we have: $$x+y=90, x-y=55$$

title: Elimination
text: We can eliminate $$y$$ from this equation by adding them together. We get $$2x=145$$.

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{145}{2}$$, $$x=72.5$$. Plugginig this into an original equation, we get $$y=17.5$$.
